```{r}
#load data 

df <- read_csv("df_lix_sentiment.csv")

#removing NA - not sure if i should actually do that 
df <- df %>%drop_na(label, First.Author.Gender)

df <- df %>% mutate(
  First.Author.Gender = as.factor(First.Author.Gender),
  label = as.factor(label)
)

ggplot(df, aes(x = label, fill = label)) +
  geom_bar()+
  facet_wrap(~First.Author.Gender)

ggplot(df, aes(x = label, y = density(), color = label))+
  geom_smooth(method = "gam")+ facet_wrap(~First.Author.Gender)


ggplot(df, aes(x = , fill = Last.Author.Gender)) + 
  geom_bar()

```
